# Exporting {#export}

To export images and data from a __workflow__.


## Export images {-}

We currently recommend using [fireshot](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/take-webpage-screenshots/mcbpblocgmgfnpjjppndjkmgjaogfceg?hl=en) (a google chrome plugin) to capture the visuals. Once installed, with one click you can capture any view generated in Tercen.

## Export data {-}
You require to add an __export step__ in the workflow.
The step, once added to the workflow, is executed and the export file appears in your project area.
